snippet.title: Pierre's Adventures in French [Learn French with Video Games]
snippet.description:
Available now for Windows PC through STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948870

"Pierre's Adventures in French" is the language learning game designed to immerse you in a French speaking world. All characters, narration and interface is written and spoken in easy-to-understand French accompanied by graphics, animation and context so you can learn without the need for translation. Learn French the fun way!

Follow us on Social for updates:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RocketBoyGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rocketboygames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RocketBoy_Games
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rocketboy_games
